name: Troponina Elevada - Injuria Miocardica
description: Alerta para troponina elevada indicando injuria miocardica e sindrome coronariana aguda
author: Critical Lab Specialist
clinicalRationale: Troponina elevada com dor toracica e alteracao ECG constitui triade diagnostica de IAM. IAMCSST requer reperfusao em <90 minutos (porta-balao). Troponina seriada com variacao >20% em 3-6h indica evento agudo vs elevacao cronica.

inputVariables.name: troponina
inputVariables.description: Troponina I ou T (verificar corte do ensaio)

inputVariables.name: dorToracicaTipica
inputVariables.description: Presenca de dor toracica tipica (precordial, opressiva, irradiacao)

inputVariables.name: alteracaoIsquemicaECG
inputVariables.description: Alteracoes isquemicas no ECG (supra/infra ST, inversao T)

references: ESC/ACC Universal Definition of Myocardial Infarction
AHA/ACC Guidelines: Management of Acute Coronary Syndromes
Critical Lab Values: Troponin elevation requires immediate notification
